name: DefaultAcl
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl
description:
Bucket Default Access Control List

Represents a Bucket’s Default Access Control List.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

methods.name: reload!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#reload!
methods.description: Reloads all Default Access Control List data for the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.reload!

methods.name: owners
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#owners
methods.description: Lists the default owners for files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.owners.each { |owner| puts owner }

methods.name: writers
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#writers
methods.description: Lists the default writers for files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.writers.each { |writer| puts writer }

methods.name: readers
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#readers
methods.description: Lists the default readers for files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.default_acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

methods.name: add_owner
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#add_owner
methods.description: Grants default owner permission to files in the bucket.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_owner "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_owner "group-#{email}"

methods.name: add_writer
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#add_writer
methods.description: Grants default writer permission to files in the bucket.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_writer "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_writer "group-#{email}"

methods.name: add_reader
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#add_reader
methods.description: Grants default reader permission to files in the bucket.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_reader "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "authors@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.add_reader "group-#{email}"

methods.name: delete
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#delete
methods.description: Permanently deletes the entity from the bucket’s default access control list for files.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

email = "heidi@example.net"
bucket.default_acl.delete "user-#{email}"

methods.name: auth!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#auth!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the default authenticatedRead predefined ACL rule to files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.auth!

methods.name: owner_full!
title: Gcloud
Storage
Bucket
DefaultAcl#owner_full!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the default bucketOwnerFullControl predefined ACL rule to files in the bucket.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

bucket.acl.owner_full!

storage = gcloud.storage

bucket.acl.owner_read!
